title: CAI-Based Laryngeal Anatomy Short-Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Novice professional learners in administrative/leadership roles engage in self-directed learning using VR simulations in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify the 12 major structures of the larynx through a 3D VR module.
Learners can explain the vocal production mechanism in a larynx anatomy simulation with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can achieve a motivation level of 4.0/5.0 or higher based on the IMMS survey criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
